snippet.title: Golem Teaser
snippet.description: Teaser for the upcoming point-and-click puzzle game Golem by Longbow Games. Golem is a point-and-click puzzle game about the adventures of a young girl and the mysterious, evolving golem. Help the two companions navigate the ruins of an ancient tower as they re-activate its long-dormant machines in a quest to help her future and discover his past. Golem is coming to PCs in early 2018.
